message.original: “筆跡が新しい日記のページが落ちている”
message.translation: "The handwriting is from a page that has fallen out of a new diary."

message.original: 数多の魔物を打ち倒し、 実力をつけていく手応えは確かに感じていた―― だからこそ、慢心があったのかもしれない
message.translation: I certainly felt the way to put my skills to the test, was to defeat a multitude of monsters... Perhaps I was too overconfident in my ability.

message.original: 先の戦いで手負いだとしても、油断があったとしても こうも簡単に囲まれるとは情けない――
message.translation: Even if you purposely throw the previous battle, and even if you were unprepared, it is pitiful to be surrounded as easily as this...

message.original: 暗闇の先から、盗賊たちの息遣いが聞こえる この緊張を破るきっかけがあれば、 飢えた狼のように一斉に飛びかかる気なのだろう
message.translation: From the darkness, you can hear the thieves breathing as they wait for a chance to break the tension in the air. Perhaps they're going to jump out and strike in unison like starving wolves.

message.original: 全てを塔に置いてきたことだけが、唯一の救いだ あの妖しき宝は、盗賊ごときに渡すのは惜しいからな
message.translation: Putting everything into the tower, may prove to be my salvation. That bewitching treasure, it would be regrettable to hand it over to someone such as a thief.

message.original: “良くない運命” ――あぁ、音も無く忍び寄られていたのか
message.translation: "Bad fate" ...Aah, have you been creeping up on me without a sound?
